name: Falling in Space (Melten)
description:
Falling in Space is a puzzle game situated in space.

(Story):

You're an astronaut in your spaceship when suddenly your engine malfunctions,

you now need to move through the ship and repair the engine before you crash into Jupiter.

(Controls):

A/D = Move Left/Right.

Q/E = Use The Gravity Switch.

Space = Jump!

Game Created by: Melten (Jeppe) , ccoodduu (William).
